sentences.cn: 把高等学校 简写 为高校.

sentences.en: Accordng to the Abbreviate Injury Score ( AIS ) and Injury Severe Score ( ISS ) , diagnosis and treatment were done simultaneously.
sentences.cn: 按照紧急生命评估程序边诊断边救治. 创伤严重程度按照AISISS标准评分.

sentences.en: Also , try to avoid abbreviations. If you must abbreviate, use standard abbreviations.
sentences.cn: 避免用缩略语, 如果必须, 要用标准缩略语.

sentences.en: And, furthermore, he started to abbreviate.
sentences.cn: 此外，他开始使用缩写词。

sentences.en: Because of its English abbreviate is APEC, also abbreviation is Yapeike.
sentences.cn: 因其英文缩写为APEC, 也简称为亚佩克.

sentences.en: Don't be afraid to abbreviate. You should cut a paragraph here and shorten one there.
sentences.cn: 别怕缩短文章. 你应该把这段删去,把那段缩短一些.

sentences.en: I like to abbreviate my name because it's easier for people to remember.
sentences.cn: 我喜欢缩写我的名字,因为这样人们更容易记忆.

sentences.en: I like to abbreviate my title since it's easier for human to remember.
sentences.cn: 我喜爱简写我的姓名,因该那样大部分人更简易记住.

sentences.en: Is this abbreviate in ALD the financial middle finger of retail trade what?
sentences.cn: ALD这个缩写在零售业的财务中指什么 呢 ?

sentences.en: It is seldom acceptable to abbreviate words in formal writing.
sentences.cn: 在正式的书面语中使用缩写语通常是不能接受的.

sentences.en: N You can even abbreviate and put Y or N.
Objective : To study the relation between Obstructive sleep apnea hpoventilation syndrome ( abbreviate OSAHS ) and Cardiovascular disease.
sentences.cn: 目的: 探讨阻塞型睡眠呼吸暂停低通气综合症 ( OSAHS ) 与心血管疾病的关系.

sentences.en: She had lost the power to abbreviate the remaining steps of the way.
sentences.cn: 她丧失了缩短这最后几步路的能力.

sentences.en: The creators of the original X-Men abbreviated the title of its sequel to simply X2.
sentences.cn: 第1部《X战警》的创作者们把其续集的片名缩写成简单的《X2》。
我们将把“有方向的图”简称为方向图.

sentences.en: Which of these words do you want me to abbreviate for the telegram?
sentences.cn: 您要我将这些字中的哪些字缩写成电报?

words.tran_cn: 简短的；小型的；服装超短的

trans.tran_en: to make a word or expression shorter by not including letters or using only the first letter of each word

trans.tran_cn: 使简短，缩简，缩略，使用缩写词
trans.tran_en: to make a word or expression shorter by not including letters or using only the first letter of each word
